form.name: no_signs_of_pneumonia_or_very_severe_disease
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Cough Or Difficult Breathing> No Signs of Pneumonia or Very Severe Disease

field.name: If child has been coughing for > 2 weeks, refer to health center or hospital for further assessment
Teach mother/caregiver to soothe the throat and relieve cough with a safe remedy
Teach mother/caregiver to give oral antibiotics at home
If child still breastfeeds, observe mother breastfeeding and provide counseling on breast attachment and positioning, if necessary
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding a sick child
Advise mother/caregiver when to return for care immediately
Advise mother/caregiver to return for follow-up care in 5 days
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
